statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT sender_address, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE receiver_address = 'Alice'
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transaction_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE sender_address = 'Bob'
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE sender_address = 'John Doe' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM transaction_records WHERE amount < 50 AND receiver_address = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE sender_address = 'Bob' OR receiver_address = 'Alice' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT from_address, to_address, amount FROM transaction_records;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transaction_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT to_address, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE from_address = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE from_address = '0x123abc' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE to_address = '0x456def' AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY to_address;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, timestamp FROM transaction_records WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM transaction_records WHERE from_address IS NOT NULL AND to_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT block_number, block_hash, miner_address, num_transactions FROM blocks ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT address_id, address, balance FROM addresses WHERE balance < 500;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT from_address, to_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE block_number > 500 AND block_number < 1000 ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT address, balance FROM addresses WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT block_number, block_hash, miner_address, num_transactions FROM blocks WHERE block_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN blocks ON transactions.block_number = blocks.block_number WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_type = 'full_node';
SELECT account_id, account_address, account_balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT node_id, node_type FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_type = 'full_node';
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT log_id, action, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT asset_name, asset_symbol FROM asset_types WHERE asset_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT action, description, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE asset_type = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT asset_name, asset_symbol FROM asset_types WHERE asset_id = 2005;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
